mapper.select: select price from tbl_material_price where status = 1 and supplierId = #{supplierId} order by markDate DESC limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_material_price(id, supplierId, price, markDate, modifydate, remark, status) values(#{id}, #{supplierId}, #{price}, #{markDate}, sysdate(), #{remark}, #{status})
mapper.update: update tbl_material_price set price = #{price}, markDate = #{markDate}, remark = #{remark}, modifydate = sysdate() where id = #{id}
update tbl_material_price set status = '0', modifydate = sysdate() where id = #{id}
